tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: Dr. Poonam is an exceptional dentist who provides compassionate care and exceptional expertise. Her gentle approach and attention to detail ensure a comfortable experience for patients. With her extensive knowledge and modern techniques, she delivers outstanding results. Highly recommended for anyone seeking top-notch dental care.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
It was very satisfying experience. Dr. Poonam and her team was very friendly and provides best in class services. Dr. Poonam was so kind enough to explain me about the procedure step by step slowly, making sure I understand. Also explained the after effects of using each type of crown. 

Although the treatment was painless, I felt uncomfortable with the crown fixed, after a week of the whole treatment. I went back to Clinic very early that day and Dr. Poonam did not hesitate to check the issue right away, as soon as she logged in. Dr Poonam was very approachable and sorted my issue quickly. I waited out a month to upload this review to include any side effects, if I faced any. But there was none. I'am back to my normal routine with a no problem at all. They were so ethical in their work and also did not try to upsell anything. I would highly recommend to visit this place for any dental treatments.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,
review: I was suffering from bleeding and swollen gums. So decided to visit Little pearl dental clinic at BTM 2nd stage. The doctors over here are friendly and give you the detailed description about the problem and it's solution. Regarding my problem, I was treated by Dr. Vinayak for gums treatment which included laser and the experience was so smooth. Dr. Vinayak is very friendly and helpful, he treated the problem in a very efficient way and guided me throughout. Root canal was also done by Dr. Sainath and Dr. Poonam. They both were so calm throughout the process and perfectly done their work. I highly recommended this clinic for all the dental issues. Thanks a lot to all the doctors who helped me and good luck ü§û

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review:
Very pleasant and extremely satisfying experience. Unlike most of the dental clinics in Bangalore that merely try to fleece money from patients by either upselling or recommending treatments that are just not necessary for the patient that are so overpriced, Dr. Poonam as well as the clinic that she is associated come across as genuinely emphatic towards the patients that they see and treat. 

Would definitely recommend this dental clinic for whoever has had a bad experience with dentist in Bangalore and I'm sure it would restore their faith back in doctors :)

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
review: I was recommended to this particular clinic by a friend and I was attended by Dr Poonam Kumari, it was unlike any routine or regular dental visits the whole dimension and approach to oral hygiene and dental problems was given a new narrative by Dr Poonam. I was facing lot of issues post non-veg meal, I was facing pyorrhea and gap between teeth issues. I was briefed about upkeep and routine maintenance of teeth and Doctor gave dental brush as complimentary to use as a replacement to tooth pick post non-veg meal. I recommend this doctor for friendliness, approachability, informative.

I've been through many dental sessions and everytime I undergo a session, there's some kinda discomfort lurking around. 

But, Dr Poonam was something out of the box! I had 5 teeth drilled to be filled (3 major, 2 minor) and throughout the process i was constantly engaged by her. She explained me the entire process real time and i think that caught my attention. 

They say few hands are just magical and i believe Dr Poonam's are one such pair! No stress, no pain, no discomfort even after 5 filling and the finish was just perfect!

I could recommend anyone to go and visit Dr Poonam for their dental issues!
